    The main dashboard for administrators in the Aurora app.

    Represents a lightweight data model used by the Admin dashboard to display basic event information in a list.

    A small set of helper methods used across admin-related classes.

    Pure unit tests for logic used by the admin features.

    Displays the alerts screen for entrants in the Aurora app.

    Basic data model representing a user document from the Firestore "users" collection.

    Application class for the Aurora app.
